name: L-systems
tagline: Lindenmayer Systems are visual representations of a set of instructions to follow and from these instructions varying figures are created. This algorithm is commonly used for the study of artifical life programming.
body:
L-SYSTEMS

L-Systems were considered as mathematical theory of a plant development. The growth and topology of a plant and its relations between cells or larger plant modules. One concept of L-System was recursive and rewriting methods. It starts on it's axiom or the seed and then the generator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
